attributes.action: change the English National Anthem to Bohemian Rhapsody by Queen.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Few people know the actual words to the English national anthem, it's dated and uninspiring. 

Everyone knows Bohemian Rhapsody and it's almost always voted as the greatest song of all time by polls all over the place. It is by one of the most famous and successful English bands of all time.

The band is Queen (obviously) and so there is still some connection to the monarchy in it and everyone would join in pride to sing along whenever it's played.

reasons: Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
